alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 1:57PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1044.0 feet, 487th Avenue begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 1043.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM CDT Tuesday was 1043.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1041.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening by 1100 PM CDT.
